channel.title: TitanX OSRS | Custom Skilling Area | FullScreen | Stable XP & Economy+
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://[/img]
[URL=http://titanx317.ddns.net/]Home[/URL] [URL=http://titanx317.ddns.net/forums/]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://titanx317.ddns.net/forums/index.php?/forum/41-titanx-client-download/]Download[/URL]
[IMG]http://devotion3.com/Images/Splitter.png[/img]
[B]Welcome[/B] Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. PvM/Economy based but PKing is welcome TitanX OSRS offers all 23 of OSRS skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play. We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.
[IMG]http://devotion3.com/Images/Splitter.png[/img]
[B]Stability[/B] TitanX OSRS contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind TitanX OSRS is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server.. The server is very optimized, don't expect any lag at all whilst playing.
[IMG]http://devotion3.com/Images/Splitter.png[/img]
Features
- Loading 602 Data with 474 Maps - Fullscreen/Resizable/Fixed - F-Keys - Zooming - Highscores - Vote System - Auto Donate - Awesome Donator benefit - All skills working - Active community - Frequent Updates - Stable / No Lag - Quests - Perfected Slayer system. - Flawless combat - Helpful & Active staff - Full 63 Wave jad - Good economy - Good drop rates
Bosses
- Godwars - KBD - Dagannoths - Kalphite Queen - Corporal Beast - Tormented Demons - Chaos Elemental - Barrelchest
- Minigames - - Duel Arena - Barrows - Fight Pits - Fight Cave - Ranging Guild - Warriors Guild
[IMG]http://devotion3.com/Images/Splitter.png[/img]
[CENTER]Media[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://devotion3.com/Images/Splitter.png[/img]
